channel.title: ASX:LYC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ASX:LYC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lynas Rare Earths Plans A$750 Million Share Sale for Growth
item.description: Lynas Rare Earths Ltd., the critical-materials miner backed by Australian billionaire Gina Rinehart, is seeking to raise A$750 million ($488 million) to speed up its expansion.
